plot: A family of self-proclaimed liberals is forced to address underlying hypocrisy in this contemporary comedy about privilege and tolerance on Manhattan's Upper East Side.
title: Under the Table
plot_es: A family of self-proclaimed liberals is forced to address underlying hypocrisy in this contemporary comedy about privilege and tolerance on Manhattan's Upper East Side.
plot_en: A family of self-proclaimed liberals is forced to address underlying hypocrisy in this contemporary comedy about privilege and tolerance on Manhattan's Upper East Side.
